post.description:
This endpoint is used for placing orders. See individual fields below for more details on their use.
All orders require a symbol. All other fields are optional except when otherwise specified.

These are the valid ordTypes:

  • `1` - Limit The default order type. Specify an orderQty and price.
  • `2` - Market A traditional Market order. A Market order will execute until filled or your bankruptcy price is reached, at which point it will cancel.
  • `D` - Previously Quoted

TimeInForce (tif) - Specifies how long the order remains in effect. These are the valid tif:

  • `0` - Day (or session)
  • `1` - Good Till Cancel (GTC)
  • `2` - At the Opening (OPG)
  • `3` - Immediate Or Cancel (IOC)
  • `4` - Fill Or Kill (FOK)
  • `7` - At the Close

Types of combinations ordType and tif below:

  • LO - ordTypes = 1 & tif = 0
  • ATO - ordTypes = 2 & tif = 2
  • ATC - ordTypes = 2 & tif = 7
  • MP/MTL - ordTypes = 2 & tif = 0
  • MOK - ordTypes = 2 & tif = 4
  • MAK - ordTypes = 2 & tif = 3
  • PLO - ordTypes = D & tif = 7

exectType describes the specific Execution Report (i.e. Pending Cancel) while OrdStatus <39> will always identify the current order status (i.e. Partially Filled). These are the valid exectType:

  • `0` - New
  • `4` - Canceled
  • `5` - Replaced
  • `6` - Pending Cancel (e.g. result of Order Cancel Request)
  • `8` - Rejected
  • `A` - Pending New
  • `E` - Pending Replace
  • `F` - Trade (partial fill or fill)

ordStatus - Identifies current status of order. These are the valid ordStatus:

  • `0` - New
  • `1` - Partial Filled
  • `2` - Full Filled
  • `4` - Canceled
  • `5` - Replaced
  • `6` - Pending Cancel (e.g. result of Order Cancel Request)
  • `8` - Rejected
  • `A` - Pending New
  • `E` - Pending Replace

Types of combinations exectType and ordStatus below:

  • exectType= 'A' - Pending New
    • ordStatus = 'A' Pending New - Just received by API Tier, sending to Trading CORE
  • exectType= '0' - New
    • ordStatus = 'A' Pending New - Just received & processed by Trading CORE, sending to Exchange
    • ordStatus = '0' New - Completed for placing new order. This Order already in Order Book of Exchange
  • exectType= '6' - Pending Cancel
    • ordStatus = '6' Pending Cancel - Just received by API Tier, sending to Trading CORE
  • exectType= '4' - Cancelled
    • ordStatus = '6' Pending Cancel - Just received & processed by Trading CORE, sending to Exchange
    • ordStatus = '4' Cancelled - Completed for cancelling a order. This Order already removed from Order Book of Exchange
  • exectType= 'E' - Pending Replace
    • ordStatus = 'E' Pending Replace - Just received by API Tier, sending to Trading CORE
  • exectType= '5' - Replaced
    • ordStatus = 'E' Pending Replace - Just received & processed by Trading CORE, sending to Exchange
    • ordStatus = '5' Replaced - Completed for Replacing a order. The new Order already in Order Book of Exchange
  • exectType= 'F' - Trade
    • ordStatus = '1' Partial Filled
    • ordStatus = '2' Full Filled

Def_Category.description:
Orders Category
* `Normal` - 
* `Outtime` - 
* `Conditional` - Not supported
* `Basket` - Not supported
* `Manual` - Not supported

Def_ExecInst.description:
Order Side
* `2` - Work (Lệnh bình thường)
* `E` - Do not increase (Không được phép sửa lệnh tăng giá trị)
* `F` - Do not reduce (Không được phép sửa lệnh giảm giá trị)
* `E,F` - Do not replace (Không được phép sửa lệnh)

Def_SettlType.description:
Settlement Type (Loại hình thanh toán)
* `3` - (T+2) Stock
* `2` - (Next Day - T+1) Bond
* `6` - Future

Def_OrderType.description:
Order Trading Type
* `1` - Market
* `2` - Limit
* `3` - Stop/Stop Loss (Not supported)
* `4` - Stop Limit (Not supported)

Def_TimeInForce.description:
Specifies how long the order remains in effect
* `0` - Day (or session)
* `1` - Good Till Cancel (GTC)
* `2` - At the Opening (OPG)
* `3` - Immediate Or Cancel (IOC)
* `4` - Fill Or Kill (FOK)
* `7` - At the Close

Def_MarketType.description:
Specifies how long the order remains in effect
* `CASH` - Supplied products is Stock, Cover Warrant, ETF  
* `DERIVATIVES` - Supplied products is Future Indexes, Future Bonds, Option

Def_Exchange.description:
Specifies how long the order remains in effect
* `HSX_LISTED` - Listed market at HSX
* `HNX_LISTED` - Listed market at HNX
* `HNX_UPCOM` - OTC Market at HNX
* `HNX_DERIVATIVES` - Derivatives market at HNX

Def_TradingSessionId.description:
Specifies how long the order remains in effect
* `HSX_LISTED` - Listed market at HSX
* `HNX_LISTED` - Listed market at HNX
* `HNX_UPCOM` - OTC Market at HNX
* `HNX_DERIVATIVES` - Derivatives market at HNX

Def_SecuritiesStatus.description:
Identifies the trading status applicable to the transaction
* `NORMAL` - allowed executing orders
* `HALT` - Not allowed executing orders (inclue Automatched & Putthrough Order)
* `HALT_AT` - Not allowed executing orders (new, cancel, replace orders)
* `HALT_PT` - Not allowed executing Putthrough Orders (new, cancel, replace orders)

Def_SecurityType.description:
Indicates type of security. Security type enumerations are grouped by Product(460) field value. NOTE Additional values may be used by mutual agreement of the counterparties.
* `CS` - Common Stock
* `WAR` - Warrant (include Cover Warrant)
* `FUT` - Future  (Not supported)
* `OPT` - Option (Not supported)
* `CORP` - Corporate Bond
* `MF` - Mutual Fund

Def_Currency.description:
Identifies currency used for price
* `VND` - Vietnamese Dong
* `USD` - United States Dollar

Def_Product.description:
Indicates the type of product the security is associated with. See also the CFICode (461) and SecurityType (167) fields.
* `5` - EQUITY
* `7` - INDEX
* `12` - OTHER
* `13` - FINANCING

Def_Channel.description:
Specifies how long the order remains in effect
* `I` - Internet Channel
* `M` - Mobile Channel
* `D` - Broker Channel
* `B` - Bloomberg Channel
* `H` - Home Channel
* `O` - Omnibus Channel

Def_ExecType.description:
Describes the specific ExecutionRpt (e.g. Pending Cancel) while OrdStatus(39) will always identify the current order status (e.g. Partially Filled).
* `0` - New
* `4` - Canceled
* `5` - Replaced
* `6` - Pending Cancel (e.g. result of Order Cancel Request)
* `8` - Rejected
* `A` - Pending New
* `E` - Pending Replace
* `F` - Trade (partial fill or fill)

Def_OrdStatus.description:
Identifies current status of order.
* `0` - New
* `1` - Partial Filled
* `2` - Full Filled
* `4` - Canceled
* `5` - Replaced
* `6` - Pending Cancel (e.g. result of Order Cancel Request)
* `8` - Rejected
* `A` - Pending New
* `E` - Pending Replace

tradingSessionSubId.description:
State of the trading session.
* `Empty` - 
* `Tiker` - example SSI, VN30F1901

Def_TradingSession.description:
State of the trading session.
* `OT` - Session after market close, orders's queued at MBS CORE
* `BOD` - Pre ATO, orders's queued at Exchange Gateway 
* `ATO` - At the Open (Pre Open)
* `Open` - Open
* `ATC` - At the Close (Pre Close)
* `HALT` - 
* `RunOff` - Putthrough Session
* `Close` - Market Closed

Def_TOKEN.description: Token received when validate OTP successfully!

Def_Account.description: Trading account (7 digit, include sub account 1, 7, 8)

Def_AccountType.description:
* `P` - Tài khoản tự doanh
* `C` - Tài khoản cá nhân trong nước
* `M` - Tài khoản Quỹ 
* `F` - Tài khoản cá nhân nước ngoài

Def_ShareType.description:
* `CS` - Common Stock (Cổ phiếu)
* `WAR` - CoveredOrUncovered (Chứng quyền)
* `FUT` - Hợp đồng tương lai
* `OPT` - Hợp đồng quyền chọn

Def_CrossType.description:
* 1 - 1F Putthrough (Thỏa thuận 1 Firm)
* 2 - 2F Putthrough (Thỏa thuận 2 Firm)
* 4 - Normal (Lệnh thường)

Def_Symbol.description: Ticker symbol. Common, human understood representation of the security (include: Stock, Derivatives, Cover Warrant ...)

Def_Price.description: Price per unit of quantity (e.g. per share)

* `CHUA_CHOT_DANG_KY` - Chưa chốt đăng ký
* `CHUA_THUC_HIEN` - Chưa thực hiện
* `DA_CHOT_DANH_SACH` - Đã chốt danh sách
* `CHUA_CHOT_DS_CO_DONG` - Chưa chốt DS cổ đông
* `DA_CHUYEN_T_THAI` - Đã chuyển trạng thái
